items.title: Reclamações BR
items.description: An open source Brazilian customer complaint data visualisation website that gathers and presents information in a relevant context and a clear way. Second place at the First Brazilian Justice Ministry Open Data Application Contest.

items.title: Rodovias BR
items.description: An open source Brazilian road accidents data visualisation website that gathers and presents information on accidents and fatalities in the Brazilian roads displaying total by state and by road, including causes of the accidents and a heat maps highlighting the most violent roads and states. All data provided by the Ministry of Justice and the Federal Highway Police.
